title: [LFD] Looking for ADC who wants to climb
body:
I'm currently a Bronze 3 support main. Spent most of the time in Bronze 5, after being initially placed in Bronze 1. The ranked scene seems to have settled down now, with most jackers filtering into the bottom of Bronze 5 like they should be.

Ideally you'd have to be good in ranked (i.e. KDA over 3 at least). I've duoed with a few adcs but most bronze adcs are either scared pussies, or are constantly chasing kills instead of farming. With my last adc we climbed two divisions but while I was offline they climbed another 2 and then sitting on 0 LP they told me "I don't want to duo right now, I HAVE to win this game, I might lose!".

I need an adc who's sick of supports that don't peel, don't ward, do stupid engages etc. I'm not one of those, I only care about OBJECTIVES. If you are actually good at the game and stuck in elo hell, let's duo.

Be warned though, I will check you out beforehand :)

replies.body: Bumperino. Still duo with Lucky when he isn't banned lel. Add me RMC Grotato, we've played in games before, I've seen you about the place.

Hello there, I'm an ADC main who can play almost all ADCs, my strongest ADCs are Kalista, Graves, Lucian, Jinx and Sivir. I know how to trade and cs.
Hit me up, ignore the name haha.

Another bump. Back to Bronze 3 atm. Had a bunch of noob teams all week. A classic bronze play is when the opposition are all AD composition apart from their support, our team feeds and doesn't rush armour items.

Looking for s4+ ADC if possible. People that know how to trade and cs.
I would like to possibly play with you, I am a good adc compared to most in my rank, but i refuse to play botlane with someone i dont know in ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=RMC Grotato,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=9Tme53Rv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-22T04:12:19.724+0000)
>
> I would like to possibly play with you, I am a good adc compared to most in my rank, but i refuse to play botlane with someone i dont know in ranked.

Sure thing, we can give it a go, add me in game. I see that you had to buy a sightstone as Graves because of noob support, lol.

Bump. So far I've had one platinum guy who used a friend's bronze account to smurf without permission. 

Currently in Bronze 2.
Hey mate, currently im duoing with some guy who has a 20 minute wait for priority but will talk soon :)
